author: weaver
msg: include=override.properties needs to come before any other prop definitions to work properly.

author: weaver
msg: Added commented out bean def for JBossAppServerManager

author: weaver
msg: Added loader repository so we don't get mashed by JBoss' unified classloader.  Now there is no need replace the dom4j.jar
in the jboss/lib directory.

author: taylor
msg: J2 is now running on JBoss 3.2.5
Hope to get the build completed soon so that deployment to JBoss is a part of the build
If you can't wait, here are the steps to deploy to JBoss into the default server as of today:
Steps to Build Jetspeed on JBoss
1. copy built and expanded /jetspeed directory into jboss/server/default/deploy/jetspeed.war (directory)
2. copy shared/lib into jboss/server/default/lib
3. copy jetspeed-(mysql)-ds.xml jboss/server/default/deploy/
4. replace JBoss's hsqldb.jar with Jetspeed's, or drop in MySQL driver into jboss/server/default/lib
5. replace in jetspeed-spring.xml the TomcatApplicationManager with JBossApplicationManager
org.apache.jetspeed.tools.pamanager.servletcontainer.JBossManager
remove all 4 parameters
6. replace dom4j.jar with dom4j 1.5-rc1.jar
